mapper.sql: INCOME_MANAGER_HIS_ID, MIGU_INCOME_MANAGER_ID, AUDIT_PERSON, AUDIT_DEPT, CREATE_DATE, DEAL_RESULT, DEAL_OPTIONS,TYPE
mapper.insert: insert into T_MIGU_INCOME_MANAGER_HIS (INCOME_MANAGER_HIS_ID, MIGU_INCOME_MANAGER_ID, AUDIT_PERSON, AUDIT_DEPT, CREATE_DATE, DEAL_RESULT, DEAL_OPTIONS,TYPE) values (#{incomeManagerHisId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{miguIncomeManagerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{auditPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{auditDept,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dealResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dealOptions,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{type})

insert into T_MIGU_INCOME_MANAGER_HIS
INCOME_MANAGER_HIS_ID,
MIGU_INCOME_MANAGER_ID,
AUDIT_PERSON,
AUDIT_DEPT,
CREATE_DATE,
DEAL_RESULT,
DEAL_OPTIONS,
TYPE
#{incomeManagerHisId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{miguIncomeManagerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{auditPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{auditDept,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{dealResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{dealOptions,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{type}
mapper.update:
update T_MIGU_INCOME_MANAGER_HIS
MIGU_INCOME_MANAGER_ID = #{miguIncomeManagerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AUDIT_PERSON = #{auditPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AUDIT_DEPT = #{auditDept,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEAL_RESULT = #{dealResult,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEAL_OPTIONS = #{dealOptions,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TYPE = #{type}
where INCOME_MANAGER_HIS_ID = #{incomeManagerHisId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT h.income_manager_his_id, h.migu_income_manager_id, d.dept_name as audit_dept, u.user_name as audit_person, h.create_date, h.deal_result, h.deal_options,h.type FROM T_MIGU_INCOME_MANAGER_HIS h left join t_migu_departments d on h.audit_dept = d.dept_code left join t_migu_users u on u.user_id = h.audit_person WHERE h.MIGU_INCOME_MANAGER_ID=#{0} AND h.TYPE = #{1} order by h.create_date asc
